name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 咩咩采集 - 快捷键下载图片

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: ALT & CLICK 下载图片, ALT & SHIFT & CLICK 移除图片背景
short.en: ALT & CLICK to download images, ALT & SHIFT & CLICK to remove image's background

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
一款用于下载网页图片的浏览器扩展程序

特点：
1. 支持【ALT + 鼠标点击】下载图片
2. 支持【ALT + SHIFT + 鼠标点击】下载移除背景的图片（一键抠图）
3. 支持保存图片格式（如 webp 保存为 png）
4. 支持设置存储文件夹（仅限于在下载文件夹设置子文件夹）
5. 理论上支持任何网站

免责声明：
“咩咩采集”只是一个工具，帮助您下载图片，但是图片可能受到版权保护。在重新使用图像之前，请确保您检查了其许可证和特定的再使用条款。请您在研究其版权状况之前，不要使用任何图片。

欢迎提出问题和需求

联系作者：
一、邮箱 285079772@qq.com
二、微信 zhu285079772
long.en:
Image Downloader Browser Extension

Features:
1. Image Download: Supports downloading images with ALT + Mouse Click.
2. Background Removal: Supports downloading images with background removed using ALT + SHIFT + Mouse Click (one-click background removal).
3. Image Format Saving: Allows saving images in different formats (e.g., saving webp as png).
4. Custom Save Folder: Users can set a specific subfolder within the Downloads folder for saving images.
5. Universal Compatibility: The extension is designed to work on virtually any website.

Disclaimer:
"BaaBaaPicker" is merely a tool to assist you in downloading images. However, please be aware that images may be subject to copyright protection. Before reusing any images, ensure you check their licenses and specific reuse terms. Do not use any images until you have researched their copyright status.

Questions and Requests:
Feel free to reach out with any questions or requests.

Contact the Author:

Email: 285079772@qq.com
WeChat: zhu285079772
